lead_paragraph: GOLDSMITH--Barbara. Author, historian and beloved mother of Andrew Goldsmith, Alice Elgart, John Goldsmith and grandmother of six. Private funeral. Memorial service at later date. In lieu of flowers, donations to Barbara Goldsmith Preservation Division at NYPL or Wellesley College. 1/3
